attributes.action: Bring back the Basic rate of tax of 10p in the first £1000 to help all who work,but,especially the low income earners!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Need I really say more!The wealth does not 'trickle'down to the average wage earner, nor, to the full working poor, Yes PM Brown gave the lower paid about £60 back from the tax they had already paid,but for the lower paid earners ,especially for the youth in this country,the wages are a pittance after tax.Lowering the v.a.t.will only help the well off who can afford to spend!
